properties.name: Ayutthaya Historical Park
properties.description: UNESCO ruins of former Siamese capital with Buddha head in tree roots

properties.name: Wat Pho (Bangkok)
properties.description: Oldest Bangkok temple housing the 46m reclining Buddha and birthplace of Thai massage

properties.name: Wat Phra That Doi Suthep
properties.description: Sacred hilltop temple overlooking Chiang Mai with golden stupa

properties.name: Phang Nga Bay
properties.description: Dramatic limestone pillars rising from emerald waters, James Bond Island

properties.name: Grand Palace & Wat Phra Kaew
properties.description: Bangkok's most spectacular royal complex housing the sacred Emerald Buddha

properties.name: Sukhothai Historical Park
properties.description: UNESCO ruins of Thailand's first capital with centuries-old temples and stone Buddhas

properties.name: Wat Rong Khun (White Temple)
properties.description: Striking contemporary Buddhist temple in Chiang Rai with gleaming white fairy-tale design

properties.name: Erawan Falls
properties.description: Seven-tiered waterfall in Kanchanaburi with natural turquoise swimming pools

properties.name: Similan Islands
properties.description: World-class diving destination with pristine beaches, massive boulders, and rich marine life
